tt:div.tt:p:
MALORY(O.S.): Hurry, hurry, sit
down, come in!
I have the most fantastic news!

ARCHER: What, did Bub finally
die?
LANA: Who's Bub?

MALORY: My mother, and before
you make some snotty comment,

yes I have a mother, do you
want to hear my news or not?!

LANA: Yeah, if you're done
yelling at me for no reason.

MALORY: Last night, an Air
Force B-52 bomber crashed
off the coast of Bermuda!

ARCHER: Well it's about
frickin time!

What, we're we not bombing them
in advance of an amphibious
invasion?
LANA: Why would we invade.
Bermuda.

ARCHER: Ah, Bermuda. I was
thinking Bahamas.
LANA: Same question.

ARCHER: Same answer, Why
not? It's how we
got the Virgin Islands.

CYRIL: Actually, the United
States bought the Virgin Islands
from Denmark.
ARCHER: Okay, Mr. Peabody...
MALORY: Are you finished?
ARCHER: Yes.

MALORY: Good. Because the B-52
was -

ARCHER: In the middle of the
Bermuda Triangle, is this

about the Bermuda Triangle,
because that's my fourth
biggest fear!

MALORY: It's about the B-52's
payload!

MALORY: Namely, a Mark-28
hydrogen bomb.
EVERYBODY: Ohhhh!

MALORY: Which ISIS... is going
to recover.
EVERYBODY: What!?

MALORY: And then give to the
U.S. government
in exchange for a huge reward!
CYRIL: So, ransom it back.

MALORY: No, not ransom it,
Cyril, we're -look,

semantics, whatever, this is -
CYRIL: Treason?

MALORY: A huge opportunity for
ISIS!
Or the Russians...

MALORY: The B-52 is on the
ocean floor here, at a depth
of eight thousand feet...

ARCHER: or thirteen hundred
thirty-three fathoms.
LANA: How do you know that?
ARCHER: How do you not?

MALORY: So recovering the bomb
requires a deep submergence

vehicle. The only American
DSV is here, in the

Pacific. The Russians have
one in the North

Atlantic, so if they hear
about the wreck and start

steaming toward it -
ARCHER: They don't actually
steam anymore, Mother.

MALORY: It's a figure of
speech, like "shut your hatch,"

because my point was,
the Russians will beat them

to it. So we are going to
beat the Russians.
ARCHER: Give it up, folks!
Mike Eruzione!

LANA; Well - shut up - since
Krieger doesn't have a
submersible hidden in his lab...
KRIEGER: Or do I?
I don't, actually.

ARCHER: Then how are we
supposed to beat anybody to

a hydrogen bomb, under
two-point-two-seven leagues of
water?!

CHERYL/CAROL: Oh my Jesus God
damn alright already!
MALORY: Can I possibly help you?

CHERYL/CAROL: Please, I know
you were talking loud so

I'd hear you, so whatever, but
we're not speaking so if you

want a deep submergence whatever
you can talk to my
stupid gross brother Cecil!

Who, by the way, is here to
see you.
Ms. Archer will see you now.

CECIL: Thank you, Cheryl, I -
CHERYL/CAROL: Rrraaaghh!
I hate you!
CECIL: Hello, I'm Cecil Tunt.

I believe you're in need
of some assistance?

ARCHER: (chuckling)
Yeah, RienPoortvliet just

called, he wants you to pose
for him.

C'mon, beloved illustrator of
"Gnomes"?
Jesus, read a coffee table book!
[theme music]

ARCHER (O.S.): Wow, you own an
island, an undersea laboratory,
and this... choppersaurus?

Guess it doesn't suck to be a
billionaire, huh?

CECIL: Probably not, but
Cheryl and I split our

parents' estate, so technically
I'm only worth five hundred
million.

Which also doesn't suck,
obviously.

CHERYL/CAROL (O.S.): Unlike
you who totally sucks obviously!
PAM: Will you shut up?!

I swear to God, if you get us
kicked off before I get

my jumbo scrimps on -
You'll wish you were Michael
Findlay.

CHERYL/CAROL: A, Cecil won't
kick you off, he wants

everybody here, for no good
reason --

MALORY: He doesn't need one,
he's an American hero. Who's
going to make me rich.

CHERYL/CAROL: And B, that's
not even real shrimp.
This is all vegan-soy-bullshit.
PAM: Pffrrfft! Prrfft! Puh!

CHERYL/CAROL: Because he's
totally vegan, because his

stupid gross girlfriend Tiffy's
a vegan, and a...
brother- stealer!

TIFFY (O.S.): Who can also
totally heeearyoooou...

CHERYL/CAROL: Which is amazing
because why aren't you dead
from protein deficiency?!

TIFFY: Uh, because I get all
eight essential amino acids

from amaranth and quinoa
without murdering helpless
animals?
CHERYL/CAROL (O.S.): Oooooh!
TIFFY: kkkuughh!
CECIL (O.S.): Hey, Tiff?

Could you, instead of
antagonizing her, maybe
go ahead and take off?
Love yoooou.

We'll rendezvous with my
research vessel in a few hours,

so in the meantime,
I guess, continue to make

such wildly liberal use of the
bar.

ARCHER: Done! You're okay,
Cecil. I don't get why Cheryl
hates you so much.
CECIL: Right?

ARCHER: I mean, you've got
this whole Jacques Cousteau

thing going on, that's -
CECIL: Just one of many

philanthropies. I have so
much on my plate, as it were.

Children Without Plates,
speaking of plates, uh,
Doctors Within Borders...
ARCHER: Within borders.

CECIL: Well, of countries
ravaged by war.

ARCHER: Right, otherwise -
CECIL: Otherwise there's not
really much point.

Then there's Nourish A Child,
Shoe A Child, Bespectacle A

Child,
umm, One Laptop Per Child
Soldier...
ARCHER: Wait, what?

CECIL: Which, unfortunately,
soon became One Thousand
Laptops Per Warlord.

ARCHER: Man, all those
charities have gotta

cost, like -
CECIL: Hey! I should go help
Tiffy.

Since we're flying into the
Bermuda Triangle...
where mysteries abound!
ARCHER: What kind of mysteries?
CECIL: I'm kidding!

ARCHER: Well Cheryl, you come
by it honest.
LANA (O.S.): Speaking of...

ARCHER: Aagh! Lana c'mon,
we're about to fly into the

Bermuda Triangle, my nerves
are frayed enough as it is.
LANA: Really.

ARCHER: No, Long Island Iced
Tea number three really took
the edge off. Want one?

LANA: No, I'm not drinking,
but -

ARCHER: Oh my God! I totally
saw this coming!
LANA: You saw what coming?

ARCHER: Did you not join the
Nation of Islam?

LANA: No, Archer, I -
ARCHER: You know they won't

let you keep dating Cyril,
right? Plus no bacon?
LANA: You done?

ARCHER: Well for now, but
after I take a nap -

LANA: You'll wake up just in
time to get shot for treason,

because your mother
wants to ransom a hydrogen

bomb back to the
United States government.

ARCHER: It's a reward! And
maritime salvage law is
very clear on the subject.
According to Cecil.

LANA: And what's he getting
out of this?

ARCHER: I... guess whatever
useless thing philanthropists

normally get from
squandering their money on the
poor.

LANA: So what, he's conducting
a huge naval operation just
for a warm fuzzy?

ARCHER: I -- hey, wait a
second!
LANA: What?

ARCHER: I think I have room
for a fuzzy navel.

CHERYL/CAROL (O.S.): Wow Tiffy,
who taught you how to fly?

Was it that goose you freed,
ruining last year's Christmas

dinner, or --
TIFFY: Rrrgh, Cecil, I swear
to Goddess...?

CECIL: I know, Tiffy, but
please, try to focus on

the greater good. In the
words of the immortal Jeremy

Bentham -
TIFFY: Good thing I'm

immortal, cause if she says
one more word to me I will slam

this helicopter into the
frickin ocean.
CECIL: Well, you seem busy.

MALORY: So say it's worth two
billion, a fair reward on that
would be...
CECIL: um, hello!

MALORY: Oh, Mr. Tunt! Please,
join me, you're just the person
I want to talk to....

CECIL: And I you. About my
sister. I was curious if you'd
noticed anything...

well, curious, about her
behavior.
MALORY: Ha! Ha! Ha!
Oh, you're serious.
CECIL: I'm afraid so, yes.

MALORY: Well how much time do
you have?
CECIL: As much as you need...

CECIL (O.S.): Oh my God, I
don't know what to say...

I have figuratively lost my
tongue.

MALORY: With Brent it was
almost literally.

That's why we can't have
scissors.

CECIL: I had no idea her
mental state had declined

to such an extent. I mean,
the arson's not surprising...
CHILD CECIL: What have you done?
CHILD CHERYL/CAROL: Ha haha!
Take that, gazebo!

CECIL: But you're telling me
she had...

MALORY: Mm! Choke-sex, that's
her kink!

With a KGB cyborg. After she
led him straight to the

ISIS safehouse,
at 921 East Seventy-Third
Street.

CECIL: Oh my -- wait, is that
classified?

MALORY: I won't tell if you
won't tell...

CECIL: Mmmkay! Well, I
appreciate your candor in

this matter, Ms. Archer -
MALORY: Oh no, it's Ms.
Oh.

CECIL: Ms., yes, thank you
for, um... yes.
[creepy music]

ARCHER (O.S.): Come on, you call
this fully stocked?

And no Georgia peaches? What
the--?
ARCHER: What're you doing?

CHERYL/CAROL: I -- what're you
doing?!

ARCHER: Hairy navel. Started
as a fuzzy, but I'm calling
this vacation, so...
Okay.
Love our little talks!
PAM: Rrowrf.Om nom nomnomnom.
CECIL: Hi, it's Pam, right?

Enjoying the cruelty-free
vegan seafood buffet?

PAM: Mrmff, it's pretty good,
once you get over how
allergic I am to soy.

CECIL: What?! Oh my God, don't
eat that!

PAM: Wh-? Hey! I am a
consenting adult.

Plus I assume you've got an
epi-pen on this big
Riptide-lookin' bastard?

CECIL: I -- yes, in the first
aid kit in the cockpit, but -
PAM: Well then shut up.

CECIL: Shutting up, yes. But
before I do, could I... ask
you a few questions?

LANA: How is everybody okay
with this?
GILLETTE: How are you not?

CYRIL: Lana, you heard Ms.
Archer, it's

either us or the Russians, and -
LANA: I did not hear that,

actually, but -
GILLETTE: But if you found

somebody's wallet, you'd
expect to get a reward, so -

LANA: What if they won't pay a
reward?

Then what, she just keeps the
bomb?

CYRIL: C'mon, it's not gonna
come to that.

GILLETTE: Ooh, but if it does
we could move to Cecil's island
and be a rogue state!
CYRIL: Coool...
LANA: Ugh, forget it.

Oh, and also dummies? We're
five hundred miles from the
nearest tree.
CYRIL: Hey thanks, Magellan!

Hey wait, why the heck are you
painting my face like this?!

GILLETTE: Cause you look
fierce.
Rrowr.
PAM: Rrowrf.

CECIL: Well thank you, Pam, I
appreciate your candor,

and -- you really, really
should really stop eating
those.
PAM: Last one.
Mmrowmf.

LANA: Malory, please, is there
any way I can get you
to reconsider this?

MALORY: Well, if you feel that
strongly...
LANA: I so do.

MALORY: Cecil says marine
salvage goes for ten to

twenty percent of the item's
value, but since all I'm

asking is a measly three
percent, if you've got

sixty million dollars lying
around...?
LANA: Bwexqueeze me?!
MALORY: I know, right?

It's a steal at twice the
price.

GILLETTE: Yeah and about that,
Cyril figured out how big our
bonuses should be.
MALORY: Your what?!
CYRIL: I -- Ray made me!

GILLETTE: Cyril! C'mon you're
fierce, rrowr!
ARCHER (O.S.): Rrraarrgh!
No! Don't!

[grrrrzzz]
CECIL: Uh, could I speak to
you for a moment?

ARCHER: "Wildly liberal use,"
Cecil, those
were your exact words!

CECIL: No, of course, that's
totally fine, but I wanted

to talk to you about -
ARCHER: Don't say high-
functioning alcoholism.
CECIL: I wasn't. Going to.

ARCHER: Well then what's on
your mind?

CECIL: Well, it's about my
sister...

ARCHER: Hey whoa! I dunno what
she told you but Carol's a

consenting adult, so -
CECIL: Well that's actually

kind of my point,
I wanted to ask if you'd ever

seen my sister acting strangely,
or -
ARCHER: Ha! Oh, you're serious.

[creepy music]
CHERYL/CAROL: Just ignore it,
it's non-diegetic.

PAM: Last one, stinky-pinky-
swear.
Mrowf.
CHERYL/CAROL (O.S.): Psst! Pam!
PAM: Aw crap, already?
CHERYL/CAROL (O.S.): Pam!

PAM: Look, auditory
hallucinations aren't gonna
make you any less delicious.

PAM: Hey! I was talking to
that!

CHERYL/CAROL: Shhh! Shut up! I
need your help!
PAM: And that's how you ask?

CHERYL/CAROL: Cecil's like,
interviewing everybody!

PAM: Yeah, he -- is he? Doing
that?

CHERYL/CAROL: Yes! And I think
he's taping it!

Look, there's cameras
everywhere!
PAM: Huh.

CHERYL/CAROL: I think he's
taping them saying I'm crazy

so he can show it to a judge
and get a conservatorship over
me!
PAM: Huh.
CHERYL/CAROL: "Huh" what?!

PAM: I mean... ya
think that's the worst idea
anybody ever had?
CHERYL/CAROL: Oh. My God.

PAM: I know, it's hard to
hear, but -

[thwap]
PAM: Owww!

CHERYL/CAROL: I thought you
were my friend!

PAM: Yeah and for like six
months you also thought
you were a werewolf!
Aw crap, I can't feel my face.
PAM: Last one, swear to God.

ARCHER: Swear to God, every
full moon she'd make us
lock her in the ISIS vault.

CECIL: Oh my God, how are you
laughing?
That's not funny, it's tragic!

ARCHER: I -- no yeah, but you
know, plus time, it equals -

CECIL: Thank you, I've heard
quite enough.

Now if you'll please excuse
me, I -

TIFFY (O.S.): Cecil? My
darling whom I love?

TIFFY: And also strangers whom
I don't even like?
Our ETA is fifteen minutes.

And the seas are really
choppy, so we may be in for
a rough landing.
CECIL: Thank you love yoooooou.

So you may want to switch to
coffee.
ARCHER: Ha! Ha! Ha! ahhh.
Oh, you're still serious.
CHERYL/CAROL: Or am I?
I am, actually.

MALORY: Have you people lost
your minds?!

LANA: 'cause apparently it's
going around...

MALORY: Because - shut up - if
we recover the bomb, I

will decide if any of
you receives a tiny bonus, so -
CYRIL GILLETTE: If?! If?!

ARCHER: Guys, shut up, I got
this, shut up.
What do you mean, if?!

Also, what are we talking
about?

MALORY: Nothing. There's
nothing to talk about, because
I am -- Jesus Christ!

ARCHER: Okay, it's either the
altitude or a stroke.

Mother, it's Sterling! Do you
smell toast?
MALORY: Pam?!
PAM: Grrrgh, grrrgh!

LANA: What the -
TIFFY: -- hell are you
doing?!

The cockpit is off limits,
missy!

CHERYL/CAROL: Oh yeah?! Well
so's my inheritance!

[creepy music]
Goddammit, shut
up John Williams!

TIFFY: Oh my God you really
are crazy!
Would a crazy person do this?!
Ungh!
TIFFY: Yes!

ARCHER: What the hell's going
on?!

CECIL: It's Cheryl! She's in
the cockpit!

I think she's trying to kill
us all!
ARCHER Oh good.

For a second there I thought I
drank too much.
[slurrp]

[struggling sounds]
CECIL (O.S.): Cheryl! Cheryl,
open the door!

LANA: Rrrr! Rrrk! Why the
hell's there a lock on it?!

CECIL: Well obviously to
prevent this exact scenario

from ever happening, but -
LANA: Now?! Really?! You think

this is a
good time to be facetious?!

CECIL: I'm -- fairly certain
you're not using
"facetious" correctlrrmp.

LANA: Cheryl? Can you come out
here so we can talk about
this like adults?

Who aren't gonna die in a
helicopter crash?

CHERYL/CAROL: We'll crash with
the tapes! Of all of you stupid
jerks saying I'm crazy!
LANA: The what?

CECIL: [shrug]
CHERYL/CAROL (O.S.): The

tapes! It's part of his sneaky
plan to get a conservatorship

over me so he can steal my
inheritance!

ARCHER: That's why she
hijacked his helicopter?

Man, talk about rich people
problems.
PAM (O.S.): Grrrgh...

CYRIL: What're you -- Archer,
Pam is dying!

ARCHER: Cyril shut up! I'm in
charge here!

And...okay, here's what we're
doing!

[slurrp]
ARCHER:(burps) Emergency
tracheotomy!
PAM: Grrrk?!
CYRIL: With a crazy straw?!

ARCHER: It's fine, it's pretty
sterile, that Hairy Navel
was mostly Kentucky Moon.
PAM: Grrrgh!

GILLETTE: That's not how you
make a Hairy Navel!

ARCHER: I know, it's a new
drink, help me think of

a name, so far all I've
got is Horatio Cornblower.
Which...

Okay, Pam! Here's what's
happening!

I'm gonna make a small
incision in
your trachea with this...
PAM: Grrrrk?!
CYRIL: Archer!

ARCHER: Yeah right, that's not
sterile...

MALORY: Ugh! And since when do
you carry a switchblade?!

ARCHER: It's a long story,
Mother!
Neat.

Well, not so much long as just
not very interesting.

Okay, Pam, you with me? Then,
I'm gonna stick this in the

incision,
and you should be good to go.
Ready?
PAM: Nnghnnnngh!

ARCHER: I -- no, don't -- Pam,
stop it!

[krunch]
PAM: Nnghnnnngh!

ARCHER: Okay, sorry in advance
for this...

[krunch]
PAM: Ungh!
ARCHER: Unnngh!
PAM: Frstrrrdkerrrrrt!
Erperperrrrrn!

CYRIL: Oh my God, the first
aid kit! I
think it might have an epi-pen!
PAM: Rrrrhrrrr!

ARCHER: Ow, jeez, and
hopefully a cold pack...

GILLETTE: Go get the damn
first aid kit!

ARCHER: I am! But not because
you said so!

CYRIL: Just breathe Pam, it's
on the way!

So, you think Cecil's really
trying to steal Cheryl's
inheritance?
MALORY: Who cares?!
GILLETTE: Well you should.
MALORY: Because...?

GILLETTE: Because you've been
trying to get your bony manhooks

on her money for years,
and how the hell're you gonna
do that if Cecil gets it?!

MALORY: Tapes! We have to find
and destroy the tapes there

must be some sort of
recording device somewhere and

why are you still standing there
go!
CYRIL: What about Pam?!
MALORY: I'll buy you a new one!
CYRIL: Oww!
PAM: Grrgh, grrgh!
MALORY: Oh, quit milking it.

ARCHER: Hey hey hey, whoa, Lana
stop!
LANA: What?!

ARCHER: If you damage that, it
might not work in the
event of an emergency.

LANA: And what would you call
this?!
ARCHER: Oh right.

Speaking of,
Pam's dying of anaphylactic
shock.
You got a first aid kit?

CECIL: I -- it's in the
cockpit!

LANA: Which is locked, and --
no nonono!

BLAM
BLAMBLAMBLAMBLAMBLAMBLAMBLAM!
CECIL: Gagh!

LANA: And also apparently
bulletproof.

ARCHER: Well yeah, you'd want
it to be, to prevent -
CECIL: You shot me!
You idiot!

ARCHER: Hey! First of all, if
I shot you you'd know it!

And secondly, now
who's the idiot?
CECIL: Wh-? You! All of you!

You're here because I wanted
you here, so I could -

ARCHER: Help us get the
hydrogen bomb, yeah.

CECIL: Oh my God! There is no
bomb!
LANA: What?!

MALORY: Well, guess I had that
coming...
PAM: Grrgh!

MALORY: Well you don't have to
rub it in!

CECIL: I just wanted to get
you people on tape saying

Cheryl was crazy, so I
could get control of her

inheritance to fund my numerous
philanthropies!

[shunk]
CHERYL/CAROL: A-ha! Hang on.
Now shut up! And land...
This...
shitheap!

Ahem. Now, I believe there was
some mention of anaphylactic
shock?
LANA: Thank you!
ARCHER: She's my patient, Lana!

LANA: Wait, so if all you
wanted was to get us on tape
saying she's crazy...

CHERYL/CAROL: Which I'm
totally not, by the wrrmp.

LANA: You could've done that
in a lawyer's office.

Why drag us all the way out
to the middle of the frickin
ocean?!

CECIL: Well... promise you
won't get mad?
LANA: Uh, no?
PAM (O.S.): You ssshole!
PAM: Stupid! Drunk ass!

Switchblade tracheotomygivin
dicknuts!
ARCHER: Ow!
PAM: Rrrgh!

Sorry, thanks, I feel a lot
better.

ARCHER: Yeah that's why I
jammed it in your neck,
I figured if -- oww!

ARCHER: What the hell was that
for?!
PAM: Horatio Cornblower?!
ARCHER: I know, right?
You got anything?
PAM: Dicknuts.
CYRIL: Okay, we got the tapes!
MALORY: Big whoop.

CYRIL: I -- wait, I thought
you wanted -what
just happened?

MALORY: It was a hoax! There
is no bomb!

GILLETTE: Boom! Guess you had
that comin'

MALORY: Oh, put another man's
penis in it.

TIFFY (O.S.): Attention
unwelcome passengers...

We are now landing, so please
find your seats and fasten your
seat belts.

Or not, because frankly, I
could give a shit if all you
people live or die.

LANA: The odds on which I'd
put at about... whatcha think,
Cecil? Fifty-to- one?
MALORY: Lana? What's going on?
ARCHER: Somebody shot him.

MALORY: Will you...? Lana,
what's going on?
LANA: Why don't you ask Cecil?

CECIL: Ow! God, your hands are
like --ow!

Well as you may know, one of
my many philanthropic

endeavors is an undersea
research laboratory, which, as

luck would have it, is actually
beneath us right now.
LANA: Cut. To the chase.

CECIL: Ow! Anyhoo, the lead
scientist is threatening
-- well, he can tell you.

CECIL: Ahem. Captain
Murphy?

[creepy music]
CHERYL/CAROL: Please tell me
you guys heard that.
MURPHY: Ahhhh. Mister Tunt.

CECIL: Don't worry, he can't
see us.

MURPHY: No, but I can hear
you...
CECIL: Although he can hear us.

MURPHY: Yes I can, and please
hear me. For years, decades,

I have begged the so-
called leaders of the world to
stop poisoning our oceans.

But they have
ignored my pleas. As I will

ignore theirs, Mr. Tunt. Unless
my list of
demands is met in the next...

Tsk tsk, twelve hours. At which
point, I will launch our

missiles on Washington,
Miami, and New York.
Hope everybody has a gas mask.
[zzzrpt]

LANA: Why do they have
missiles?!

MALORY: And what did he mean
by "gas mask"?!

CECIL: I, you know, that was,
I think, maybe, probably,

because the missiles are
definitely tipped with VX
nerve gas?

EVERYBODY: [gasp]
ARCHER: Oh my God!
LANA: What?

ARCHER: The -- it's -- the --
dammit!

Still can't beat Horatio
Cornblower.
PAM: Dicknuts!
hrmmmff.
[theme music]
